\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{amsmath}

\title{Document Without Comments}
\author{Test Author}
\date{\today}

\begin{document}

\maketitle

\section{Introduction}

This is a clean LaTeX document without any comments.
It should remain unchanged after processing.

\section{Mathematical Content}

Here are some mathematical expressions:

Inline math: $E = mc^2$

Display equation:
\begin{equation}
    \int_{0}^{1} x^2 dx = \frac{1}{3}
\end{equation}

\section{Text Content}

This document contains only regular LaTeX content:
\begin{itemize}
    \item Regular text
    \item Mathematical expressions
    \item LaTeX commands and environments
\end{itemize}

\subsection{More Content}

Additional content to ensure the document structure is realistic.

\textbf{Bold text} and \emph{emphasized text} should remain as-is.

\section{Conclusion}

This document should be identical before and after comment removal
since it contains no comments to remove.

\end{document}
